	"subject": "ELA",

	"id": "f6972d6a-7ab6-440d-80c4-e7ec10478824",
	"description": "I am having trouble starting my informational essay on Mnt Everest.",
	"file": "Everest Mount Everest, the world’s highest point at 29,035 feet, is a special trophy among high altitude mountaineers. Standing atop the world’s highest point a hypoxic climber clad in a fluorescent down suit is above everything else on the planet, for a moment that individual can reach farther into the sky than any other. Arms raised in a victorious salute, a climber feels like they have conquered something that few others ever have, and justifiably so. The summit is usually the final fruition"
}
